sentence: A political action committee supporting another Republican in the race, TV host Mehmet Oz, launched an ad attacking McCormick’s ties to China, where Bridgewater Associates manages $5 billon of its $150 billion portfolio.

title: Hedge Fund Exec David McCormick Latest To Enter Pennsylvania Senate Race

sentence: Dr. Mehmet Oz, who's looking to trade in his gig as a TV doctor for a seat in the U.S. Senate, put his medical skills to use during an emergency situation at a political meeting on Saturday morning.

title: Dr. Oz jumps into action to help man who collapsed at a caucus meeting... as he continues his run for U.S Senate seat in Pennsylvania

sentence: As the most reliable and balanced news aggregation service on the internet, DML News App offers the following information published by Fox News: Dr. Mehmet Oz aided a man who called out for a doctor and then collapsed at a Pennsylvania Republican event this weekend.

sentence: Cash is pouring into Pennsylvania s hotly contested race for U.S. Senate as wealthy and well-connected candidates move in from out of state, followed by millions of dollars going into TV ads and super PACs Filings posted online by the Federal Election Commission before Monday night's deadline showed Mehmet Oz — best known as daytime TV's host of “The Dr. Oz Show” — loaned himself $5.2 million.

title: Millions follow rich candidates in Pennsylvania Senate race

sentence: Article content WASHINGTON — Former U.S. President Donald Trump on Saturday said he is endorsing celebrity surgeon Dr. Mehmet Oz, who is running as a Republican in a closely watched U.S. Senate contest in Pennsylvania.
title: Trump endorses Dr. Oz for U.S. Senate seat in Pennsylvania

sentence: Donald Trump endorsed Dr. Mehmet Oz in his bid for Pennsylvania’s open Senate seat, the former president announced Saturday.

title: Trump gives Dr. Oz ‘complete and total endorsement’ in wide-open PA Senate race

sentence: Wading into a tight Republican Senate primary in Pennsylvania, former President Donald J. Trump endorsed Mehmet Oz on Saturday, throwing his weight behind the former star of “The Dr. Oz Show,” who has been attacked by rivals as a closet liberal.
title: Trump Endorses Dr. Oz in Pennsylvania Senate Race

sentence: Article content WASHINGTON — Former U.S. President Donald Trump on Saturday said he is endorsing celebrity surgeon Dr. Mehmet Oz, who is running as a Republican in a closely watched U.S. Senate contest in Pennsylvania.
title: Trump endorses celebrity surgeon Dr. Oz for U.S. Senate seat in Pennsylvania

sentence: “The great commonwealth of Pennsylvania has a tremendous opportunity to Save America by electing the brilliant and well-known Dr Mehmet Oz for the United States Senate.” In his statement, Trump also said Oz was especially popular with women because of his work in daytime TV, and could do well in Philadelphia and Pittsburgh.
title: Dr. Oz Picks Up Donald Trump Endorsement For Republican Nod In Pennsylvania Senate Race
